name: win-dialogs
description: Node.js wrapper for native Windows file and folder dialogs using PowerShell.

scripts.test: node test/dialogs.test.js && node test/esm/dialogs.esm.test.js && node test/dialogs.test.mjs
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: PFearr
